   19: %%
   20: -module(lib_error_1_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: -compile(export_all).
   23: 
   24: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   25: 
   26: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   27: %% Function: suite() -> Info
   28: %% Info = [tuple()]
   29: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   30: suite() ->
   31:     [{timetrap,{seconds,3}}].
   32: 
   33: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   34: %% Function: init_per_suite(Config0) ->
   35: %%               Config1 | {skip,Reason} | {skip_and_save,Reason,Config1}
   36: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   37: %% Reason = term()
   38: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   39: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   40:     Config.
   41: 
   42: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   43: %% Function: end_per_suite(Config0) -> void() | {save_config,Config1}
   44: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   45: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   46: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   47:     ok.
   48: 
   49: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   50: %% Function: init_per_group(GroupName, Config0) ->
   51: %%               Config1 | {skip,Reason} | {skip_and_save,Reason,Config1}
   52: %% GroupName = atom()
   53: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   54: %% Reason = term()
   55: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   56: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   57:     Config.
   58: 
   59: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   60: %% Function: end_per_group(GroupName, Config0) ->
   61: %%               void() | {save_config,Config1}
   62: %% GroupName = atom()
   63: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   64: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   65: end_per_group(_GroupName, _Config) ->
   66:     ok.
   67: 
   68: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   69: %% Function: init_per_testcase(TestCase, Config0) ->
   70: %%               Config1 | {skip,Reason} | {skip_and_save,Reason,Config1}
   71: %% TestCase = atom()
   72: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   73: %% Reason = term()
   74: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   75: init_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
   76:     Config.
   77: 
   78: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   79: %% Function: end_per_testcase(TestCase, Config0) ->
   80: %%               void() | {save_config,Config1}
   81: %% TestCase = atom()
   82: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   83: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   84: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, _Config) ->
   85:     ok.
   86: 
   87: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   88: %% Function: groups() -> [Group]
   89: %% Group = {GroupName,Properties,GroupsAndTestCases}
   90: %% GroupName = atom()
   91: %% Properties = [parallel | sequence | Shuffle | {RepeatType,N}]
   92: %% GroupsAndTestCases = [Group | {group,GroupName} | TestCase]
   93: %% TestCase = atom()
   94: %% Shuffle = shuffle | {shuffle,{integer(),integer(),integer()}}
   95: %% RepeatType = repeat | repeat_until_all_ok | repeat_until_all_fail |
   96: %%              repeat_until_any_ok | repeat_until_any_fail
   97: %% N = integer() | forever
   98: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   99: groups() ->
  100:     [].
  101: 
  102: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  103: %% Function: all() -> GroupsAndTestCases | {skip,Reason}
  104: %% GroupsAndTestCases = [{group,GroupName} | TestCase]
  105: %% GroupName = atom()
  106: %% TestCase = atom()
  107: %% Reason = term()
  108: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  109: all() -> 
  110:     [lines_error, lines_exit, lines_hang, lines_throw,
  111:      no_lines_error, no_lines_exit, no_lines_hang, no_lines_throw,
  112:      init_tc_error, init_tc_exit, init_tc_throw,
  113:      end_tc_error, end_tc_exit, end_tc_throw].
  114: 
  115: lines_error(_) ->
  116:     io:format("Calling lib function..."),
  117:     lib_lines:do_error(),
  118:     ok.
  119: 
  120: lines_exit(_) ->
  121:     io:format("Calling lib function..."),
  122:     lib_lines:do_exit(),
  123:     ok.
  124: 
  125: lines_hang(_) ->
  126:     io:format("Calling lib function..."),
  127:     lib_lines:do_hang(),
  128:     ok.
  129: 
  130: lines_throw(_) ->
  131:     io:format("Calling lib function..."),
  132:     lib_lines:do_throw(),
  133:     ok.
  134: 
  135: no_lines_error(_) ->
  136:     io:format("Calling lib function..."),
  137:     lib_no_lines:do_error(),
  138:     ok.
  139: 
  140: no_lines_exit(_) ->
  141:     io:format("Calling lib function..."),
  142:     lib_no_lines:do_exit(),
  143:     ok.
  144: 
  145: no_lines_hang(_) ->
  146:     io:format("Calling lib function..."),
  147:     lib_no_lines:do_hang(),
  148:     ok.
  149: 
  150: no_lines_throw(_) ->
  151:     io:format("Calling lib function..."),
  152:     lib_no_lines:do_throw(),
  153:     ok.
  154: 
  155: init_tc_error() ->
  156:     put('$test_server_framework_test',
  157: 	fun(init_tc, _Default) -> lib_no_lines:do_error(), ok;
  158: 	   (_, Default) -> Default
  159: 	end), [].
  160: 
  161: init_tc_error(_) ->
  162:     ok.
  163: 
  164: init_tc_exit() ->
  165:     put('$test_server_framework_test',
  166: 	fun(init_tc, _Default) -> lib_no_lines:do_exit(), ok;
  167: 	   (_, Default) -> Default
  168: 	end), [].
  169: 
  170: init_tc_exit(_) ->
  171:     ok.
  172: 
  173: init_tc_throw() ->
  174:     put('$test_server_framework_test',
  175: 	fun(init_tc, _Default) -> lib_no_lines:do_throw(), ok;
  176: 	   (_, Default) -> Default
  177: 	end), [].
  178: 
  179: init_tc_throw(_) ->
  180:     ok.
  181: 
  182: end_tc_error(_) ->
  183:     put('$test_server_framework_test',
  184: 	fun(end_tc, _Default) -> lib_no_lines:do_error(), ok;
  185: 	   (_, Default) -> Default
  186: 	end), ok.
  187: 
  188: end_tc_exit(_) ->
  189:     put('$test_server_framework_test',
  190: 	fun(end_tc, _Default) -> lib_no_lines:do_exit(), ok;
  191: 	   (_, Default) -> Default
  192: 	end), ok.
  193: 
  194: end_tc_throw(_) ->
  195:     put('$test_server_framework_test',
  196: 	fun(end_tc, _Default) -> lib_no_lines:do_throw(), ok;
  197: 	   (_, Default) -> Default
  198: 	end), ok.
